title: Looking for someone good with WordPress and has Dev Op Skills and you will get paid for it!
body:
So as some of you may have noticed, the site is still down. The guy who does my hosting has been trying for two days but isn't having much luck past securing the database and a few other things.

If you're great with WP stuff and wouldn't mind lending a hand or know someone like this, please feel free to message me or respond here! You'd definitely get paid for this though how much is a question of what the guy who does my hosting thinks.

Thanks!

title: Abolish Work is Down (But not Out)
body:
Hey, just wanted to let everyone know that I'm well aware that AW is down right now. I have the guy who helps me host on the job and we should be back up and running by the end of the day. No promises of course but with any luck that'll be how things turn out!

-Nick
